scenarios.name: Tech Startup - R&D Focus
scenarios.description: Small software startup wanting to establish presence and leverage R&D tax credits

request.additionalContext: We develop our own IP and want to know about R&D incentives like WBSO and Innovation Box.
We operate an online marketplace and need to understand GDPR compliance and VAT registration requirements.

scenarios.name: Holding Company - Tax Structure
scenarios.description: Holding company looking to optimize tax structure

request.additionalContext: We want to understand the participation exemption (deelnemingsvrijstelling) and how it applies to our holding structure.

scenarios.name: Manufacturing Company - Physical Operations
scenarios.description: Manufacturing company setting up production facility

request.additionalContext: We're setting up a manufacturing facility and need to understand employment law, payroll taxes, and corporate structure options.

scenarios.name: Consulting Firm - Service Business
scenarios.description: Professional services firm expanding to Netherlands

request.additionalContext: We provide consulting services and want the fastest way to establish presence. Prefer branch office over full BV setup.

scenarios.name: Biotech Startup - Innovation Box
scenarios.description: Biotech company with IP looking for Innovation Box benefits

request.additionalContext: We have significant IP and want to maximize benefits from Innovation Box (9% tax rate) and WBSO R&D credits.

scenarios.name: Small Business - Minimal Setup
scenarios.description: Small business wanting simple, quick entry

request.additionalContext: We're a small business looking for the simplest and fastest way to establish presence in Netherlands.

scenarios.name: FinTech Company - Regulatory Focus
scenarios.description: Financial technology company needing regulatory compliance

request.additionalContext: We need to understand regulatory requirements for fintech companies, including AML, KYC, and financial services licensing.
We're VC-backed and planning rapid growth. Need to understand employee stock option plans, R&D credits, and optimal corporate structure for scaling.
We're a family business looking for stable, long-term structure. Need advice on BV setup, tax planning, and succession considerations.
We provide digital marketing services. Need to understand VAT obligations for service providers and employment law for hiring local talent.

scenarios.name: Pharmaceutical Company - R&D Heavy
scenarios.description: Pharma company with extensive R&D activities

request.additionalContext: We have extensive R&D activities and patents. Want to maximize WBSO credits and Innovation Box benefits for our research operations.

minimal_test.name: Minimal Request - Only Required Fields
minimal_test.description: Test with minimum required fields only

comprehensive_test.name: Comprehensive Request - All Fields
comprehensive_test.description: Test with all possible fields filled

request.additionalContext: We're a well-funded SaaS company planning rapid expansion into the Netherlands. We develop our own IP and want to maximize R&D tax benefits while ensuring full compliance.
